main.name: Manish N
main.bio: My name is Manish, I'm a  ReactJS Developer. Currently Studing Engineering

education.degree: Bachelor in Computer Science and Engineering

work.title: Full Stack Developer
work.description:
• Worked on Developing and Re-Designing a Full Scale Social Media Application. Improved the loading and response time by 30 percent.Worked on and fixed numerous bugs on the chat server which was built using NodeJs. 
 • Developed and maintained various web applications. Guided and Managed numerous Interns and reviewed their code.
   • Developed a Q&A web application using server side rendering using NextJs.
    • Developed and implemented unit testing using Jest to ensure high code coverage and early detection of defects. Thisresulted in a 50% reduction in production bugs and increased confidence in software releases

work.title: Web Developer - Intern
work.description:
• Designed and developed robust web applications and websites using ReactJS, resulting in a 30% increase in user engagement and a 40% reduction in page load times. 
   • Led the optimization efforts of existing applications, implementing code refactoring and performance tuning techniques
  • Implemented real-time notifications using WebSockets, improving user experience by providing instantaneous updates on critical information.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
